com.engine.coreObject

Class ObjectHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.coreObject.ObjectHandler

  • public class ObjectHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    ObjectHandler

    The ObjectHandler class contains a list of every CoreObject currently in the project. Those CoreObjects can all be ticked and rendered through here. NOTE: Tile ticking/rendering is not handled here. WorldHandler controls tiles. Only basic CoreObjects and extensions of CoreObjects such as Entities should be added to the list in ObjectHandler.
    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

    • Method Detail

      • tickCoreObjects

        public void tickCoreObjects()
        Tick every CoreObject currently in the project. A CoreObject is only ticked if it is in range. That is if it's within +- core.getObjectLoadDistance() from the player.

      • renderCoreObjects

        public void renderCoreObjects(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Render every CoreObject currently in the project. A CoreObject is only ticked if it is in range. That is if it's within +- core.getObjectLoadDistance() from the player.
